ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh how wrong you are.  You don t know me..you don t know my life you don t know jack as far as I am concerned.  You are probably some stupid college student
ygData.messageBody:
Oh how wrong you are. You don't know me..you don't know my life you
don't know jack as far as I am concerned. You are probably some stupid
college student who thinks that everyone has a life outside of the
game. Some of us choose not to and you know what??? I am happy that
way. I don't want to engage in the activities I did before EQ and you
know what else? its not your place to tell me or anyone else what they
should think or feel about EQ or to pass judgement on anyone for
thinking the way they do about EQ.

As for your post about that this was a list for information about
monks...blah blah blah...I don't think your orginal post had anything
to do with monks at all! In fact if it did, I would not have responded
with such anger. So who are you to be telling me what to post here when
you don't follow the rules yourself!

Now...don't bother to reply. I have gotten some advice from a few of
you and the rest have whined about this that and the other thing. What
ever. Welcome to the world of EQ. I got what I needed from those of
you who actually were kind enough to contribute to my questions and I
thank you for it. I think that there is probably nothing else worth
hearing on this list and so with that, I will be leaving the list...so
your flames won't be heard.

/i Dave
/em turns on her heel and walks out with her chin jutted out proudly
ignoring everything behind her.

Leiah

> 9 months ago, at some date in the future, EQ will not exist. I hope
> you have a contingency plan ready, because EQ is not life, or a way
> of
> life, it is simply a game you enjoy together. >

> IF EQ was perfect, or something you've been doing for tens of years
> and nothing had ever changed on it, then you would have a much better
> argument. However we can clearly see that monks aren't being singled
> out, almost every class is being tuned every month. This one was
> slightly major.
>
> But enough is enough. Shit happens and we adjust. This mailing list
> is not about these kinds of posts or this kind of thread.
>
> The purpose of this list is to distribute information about Monks to
> the players of EverQuest. Spoilers may be included so read at your
> own risk.
>
> The purpose of this list is NOT to be a vent for your fustration.
